instructions: Put the charger in the middle of the bottom part of the surface.
Put the dinner fork on the left side of the charger, with the tines pointing up.
Put the dinner knife on the right side of the charger, blade at the top, sharp side facing center.
Put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork, tines up.
Put the salad knife on the right side of the dinner knife, blade up, sharp side facing center.
Put the soup spoon on the right side of the salad knife, round side up.
Put the dessert spoon above the charger, round side facing left, tip facing right.
Put the dessert fork beneath the dessert spoon, tines facing right, tip facing left.
Put the bread plate above the forks.
Put the butter knife diagonally on the bread plate, blade facing the top left corner of the table.
Put the water glass above the knives.
Put the napkin on the top half of the plate.
